titles: De non temerandis ecclesiis A tract of the rights and respect due vnto churches. Written to a gentleman, who hauing an appropriate parsonage, imploied the church to prophane vses, and left the parishioners vncertainely prouided of diuine seruice, in a parish neere there adioyning. By Sr. Henry Spelman knight.
author: Spelman, Henry, Sir, 1564?-1641.
publisher: Printed by Iohn Beale, and are to be sold by William Welby,
notes: On title page edition statement is printed after "adioyning".
The second edition of STC 23067, published in 1613.
Another issue of STC 23067.8 with cancel title page--Cf. STC.
Some print show-through; pages 3-4 and 177-78 stained.
Page 170-end from Cambridge University Library copy spliced at end.
Reproduction of the original in the Union Theological Seminary (New York, N.Y.). Library.
keywords: Church property --  England --  Early works to 1800.
